attributes.action: Stop discrimination against those who choose not to take the COVID-19 vaccines.
attributes.additional_details: The government need to stop segregation. It needs to stop DISCRIMINATION. This is a free country and we, the citizens have rights. The public humiliation of those who choose not to take a vaccine that is linked to serious health issues after administration. We are being treated unfairly for using our human right to decline. We are being labeled anti vaxers for not wanting to take this injection linked to so many side effects. We are being branded, we are being refused entry, it is unlawful.
attributes.background: I would like the government to stop discrimination against those who choose not to take the COVID 19 vaccines and boosters. The segregation has to stop. It is inhumane and anyone partaking in the segregation is liable for legal action.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/597239
